location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 77 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding his having received private confirmation from Captain Robert Taylor of the satisfactory settlement of the misunderstanding between the Imam of Muscat (Saʻīd bin Sulṭān) and the Bussorah [Basra] government, and that as a result of this the blockade had been lifeted and the Imam's fleet returned to Muscat.
